### Introduction
This application aims to provide a visualization of certain factors and data of mental health. It has the potential to reveal and inform on potential risk factors as they may have a higher correlation with mental health conditions.

### Data Set
This application makes use of 1 dataset, the "Mental Health Dataset" found on Kaggle by Bhavik Jikadara.
